data.name: REX
data.detailed_description:
Rex is a flight shooting game from leisure to simple style. The protagonist and enemy of the game are just blocks. Although the picture is simple, its gameplay is still very high. With the progress of the game, the number and speed of enemies will increase. It's time to test your operation and see how long you can persist.

[introduction to the game]

The game starts with a small box. Players should pay attention to collision in the game. At the same time, there will be beautiful skin in the game. Players need to upgrade in the game to unlock new skin. In this game is not just a box, there will be many operations here. I believe players will like this game!

[basic operation]

Move: w / S / A / D or direction key shooting: Spacebar or left mouse button turn to direction: move the mouse
